title: Z390
author: Z390
content: I don't know if anyone is thinking the same thing, Banks are collapsing and they want to regulate crypto? How is this going to be possible? How can a corrupt system brings a transparent regulation to the crypto space? I think that this regulation is a FAD, the aim behind this regulation is not about saving mankind from crypto rug pulls, I think the plan is to squeeze the life out of crypto because of the attention its getting. If anything needs regulation, it is CENTRALIZED EXCHANGES only.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: In the end you can't change the government's decision isn't? since you have no power to speak up, even though you can speak up, you will become a target from the government since you're high risk to ruin their goal.The plan to regulate crypto is to earn more money from crypto taxation, combating against of money laundering, to control the crypto doesn't beat their CBDC etc. When you're think the government's law is too ridiculous, you have a way to use Bitcoin behind them.

comments.body: Unfortunately, governments introduced their failure to Crypto through centralized exchanges.
